name: Ancient Period
description: Pre-history to 111 BC: From Stone Age cultures through legendary dynasties to the Kingdom of Âu Lạc

name: Chinese Domination
description: Over 1000 years of Chinese rule interspersed with major rebellions and brief independence periods

name: Independent Monarchical Period
nameVietnamese: Thời kỳ Quân chủ độc lập
description: Era of independent Vietnamese dynasties characterized by southward expansion (Nam Tiến), cultural flourishing, and resistance against foreign invasions

name: French Colonial Period
description: French colonial rule, exploitation, and continuous Vietnamese resistance movements

name: First Indochina War
nameVietnamese: Chiến tranh Đông Dương lần thứ nhất
description: War for independence against French colonial forces

name: The Vietnam War and Division
nameVietnamese: Chiến tranh Việt Nam và Chia cắt
description: Period of national division, escalating conflict between North and South Vietnam, massive American military intervention, and eventual reunification

name: Reunification and Modern Vietnam
nameVietnamese: Thống nhất và Việt Nam Hiện đại
description: From post-war reunification through socialist transformation, Đổi Mới reforms, to becoming one of Southeast Asia's fastest-growing economies
